whatWeDo.title: What Does Sonicus Do?
whatWeDo.description: Sonicus specializes in therapeutic sound healing - a proven wellness practice that uses specific audio frequencies, nature sounds, and carefully crafted soundscapes to promote healing and relaxation. Our platform provides you with instant access to a professional-grade library of therapeutic sounds that you can use for meditation, stress relief, sleep improvement, and overall mental health support.

science.title: The Science Behind Sound Therapy
science.intro: Sound therapy is backed by extensive scientific research.
science.description: Studies have shown that specific audio frequencies can influence brainwave patterns, reduce cortisol levels, and trigger the body's natural relaxation response. Our therapeutic sounds utilize principles from neuroscience, psychology, and traditional healing practices to provide measurable wellness benefits.

register.title: Create Your Account
register.name: Full Name
register.passwordRequirement: Password must be at least 8 characters long

pricing.title: Choose Your Sound Healing Journey
pricing.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of therapeutic sound healing with our flexible subscription plans designed for every wellness need.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: You are billed monthly or annually depending on your chosen plan. You can change or cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access to premium features until the end of your billing period.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: All new users start with our free Starter plan. You can upgrade to Premium or Pro at any time to unlock additional features and content.

support.question: What support do you offer?
support.answer: We provide email support for all users, with priority support for Pro subscribers. Our team is here to help you maximize your sound healing journey.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Satisfaction Guarantee
guarantee.description: We're confident you'll love your sound healing experience. If you're not completely satisfied, we offer a full refund within 30 days.

pricing.joinThousands: Join thousands of users who have transformed their wellness with therapeutic sound healing.
